attributes.action: Protect farmland from being built on in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: As an example, the arable fields at Salisbury rd in Marlborough, Wilts are now under threat for housing. At the moment there is no law to protect the land; we need this changed if we are to prevent the UK from being unable to feed itself in times to come.
attributes.background: More and more farmland and farms are being swallowed up in the UK for housing. I believe that this is short-sighted-if anything we need more farmland to feed growing populations. Farmland and arable fields now need protection by law.
